channel.title: Ubuntu Studio
channel.description:
Check this out for all of you graphic/music/video editing enthusiasts!
[code]Let Your Creativity Fly...
Ubuntu Studio. A multimedia creation flavor of Ubuntu.
Ubuntu Studio is aimed at the GNU/Linux audio, video and graphic enthusiast as well as professional.
We provide a suite of the best open-source applications available for multimedia creation. Completely free to use, modify and redistribute. Your only limitation is your imagination. [/code]
[url=http://UbuntuStudio.com]UbuntuStudio.com[/url]

item.title: Ubuntu Studio
item.dc:creator: @Venym Venym
item.description:
@Venym wrote:

I think your wrong it has not been there a long time it was released in May of 2007.
Check this site out! https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuStudio
